name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Snowman Joy: Snowfall and a Cheerful Snowman in Winter Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enjoy a serene winter night with a cheerful snowman, gentle snowfall, and quick shortcuts in this live wallpaper.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enjoy a snowfall and a glowing snowman in this live wallpaper featuring sleek design and quick shortcuts.
Dynamic Live Wallpaper: A cheerful snowman in a serene Christmas setting with gentle snowfall and cozy, glowing lights.
Minimalist Design: A clean and festive interface for an enhanced browsing experience.
Clock and Data: Keep track of time and date at a glance.
Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate instantly to your favorite websites with ease.
Google Search Bar: Fast and efficient search functionality using the search engine selected by the user.
More Extension: Add festive features to make your browsing even more delightful.
Bring the joy of a snowy winter night and holiday cheer to your browser with the Snowman theme!
